title: High school tournament
body: May I ask when the next school tournament will start because my school is very interested

replies.body:
Hi Style Points,

I believe the tournament that Akuro no oka is talking about is the upcoming LetsPlayLive [High School League tournament](http://letsplay.live/hsl2/), in New Zealand.

As for Australia, I'm not aware of any national interschool tournaments taking new entries at the moment. Flaktest Gaming are still running their [season 1 ](https://www.toornament.com/tournaments/436333622363964121/information)which is currently in between Group Stages and Playoffs.

Is your school currently running a [High School Club](http://oce.leaguehighschool.com/oce/en/high-school-clubs/)? Teachers from these clubs do sometimes reach out to each other to organize tournaments between a varying number of schools in the region or state.
Thankyou. My school has a club ready to go. They're very excited and keen to get it going.
Awesome! If your club teacher ever has any questions or needs help, they can reach out to us at OCEHighschool@riotgames.com
It's in lateish July. You can sign up now if you google it.
